sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMAZZINI (Bernardin), an Italian phyſician, born at Carpi near Modena in 1633. He was profeffor of phyſic in the univerſity of Modena for 18 years; and in 1700 accepted an invitation ſrom Padua, where he was made ; rector of the college; and died in 1714. His works were collected and publiſhed in London, 1716; of which, his treatiſe De Mοrbis Artificurn, " of the peculiar maladies of artificers,” will always be eſteemed uſeful and curious.
